channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:34 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter!
item.description: 游댮 09:34 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:26 Alarm lifted in Khmelnytskyi region. Follow further messages.
